amendment.description: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to require the Director of National Intelligence, in coordination with the Under Secretary of Homeland Security for Intelligence and Analysis, to submit a report on domestic terrorism activity within the United States to the congressional intelligence committees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Yoho.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
